**PWPush Chrome Extension**

Securely share passwords, URLs, or other sensitive information with just a click! The PWPush Chrome Extension is a convenient way to push your selected content to PWPush, generating secure, self-destructing links that are easy to share and highly customizable.

### Features:
- **Right-Click Context Menu**: Easily generate PWPush links by right-clicking on any highlighted text and selecting "Send to PWPush."
- **Instant Clipboard Copy**: The generated link is automatically copied to your clipboard, saving time and effort.
- **User-Friendly Popup Interface**: Enter custom text or a URL in the extension popup to generate a PWPush link. Optional settings can be configured for enhanced security.
- **Custom Expiration Settings**: Set expiration based on days or number of views, add a passphrase, or choose one-step link generation to ensure maximum privacy.
- **Flexible Settings Page**: Customize default expiration settings, choose one-step links, and allow viewers to delete links.
- **Notifications**: Receive custom notifications to confirm that links are copied to your clipboard successfully.

### Why Use PWPush Chrome Extension?
- **Security First**: Content shared via PWPush is encrypted and set to expire based on user-defined settings.
- **Convenience**: No need to manually visit the PWPush websiteâ€”use the context menu or popup to generate secure links quickly.
- **Flexible Sharing**: Supports multiple kinds of pushes, including text, URLs, and files.

**Please Note**: This extension requires permissions to access the active tab, clipboard, and context menu to provide a seamless user experience. These permissions are used strictly to enable the features outlined above.

Install the PWPush Chrome Extension now to simplify and secure your sensitive sharing needs. Support the official PWPush release by visiting [PWPush.com](https://pwpush.com/).
